channel.title: Source on Bennett Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Source on Bennett Notes

item.title: Play Half Life on Android Wear
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Just because you can, doesn’t mean you should. But in this case, you totally should. If you recall, I demonstrated how to play Team Fortress Classic on Android using the SDLash app. The app is able to emulate the GoldSource game engine, which was used in many of the classic valve games such as Half-Life and Team Fortress. Right now, I am putting together a tutorial on how to play Half-life on Android, but in the meantime, check out how to do it on Android Wear (albeit a little more complicated).

item.title: How to Build Custom Cyanogenmod Rom
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Build Custom Cyanogenmod Rom? So are you ready to take on Rom Development? That’s okay if you’re not, because I’ll help walk you through it. In this tutorial, I’m going to show you how to build your own Cyanogenmod Rom right from source. This sounds a lot more complicated than it actually is though. However, keep in mind that you will need a lot of patience when doing this.
